pkgmetadata.longdescription: ---title: APIstags: technology, documentation---### FinX Capital Markets LLCPlease see LICENSE and SECURITY for terms of use.***# FinX Python Software Development KitThe **FinX SDK** is a python package that has interfaces to the FinX Capital MarketsAnalytics Platform (the 'FinX Platform'). The code in the SDK makes calls to REST APIs & WebSocket endpoints. A valid ___FinX API Key___ is required for the SDK to return results.To obtain an API Key, please contact us FinX Capital Markets LLC [via email](mailto:info@finx.io).***## IntroductionThis document is the definitive source of information for using the FinX SDK.---title: APIstags: technology, documentation---# Developer Notes - FinX SDKThe **FinX SDK** is a python package that has interfaces to the FinX Capital MarketsAnalytics Platform (the 'FinX Platform'). The code in the SDK makes calls to REST APIs & WebSocket endpoints. A valid ___FinX API Key___ is required for the SDK to return results.To obtain an API Key, please contact us FinX Capital Markets LLC [via email](mailto:info@finx.io).Please see LICENSE and SECURITY for terms of use.***# Technical Documentation - FinX SDKTechnical docs may be found at [http://docs.finx.io](http://docs.finx.io)
